job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description:
Our client is looking for a Machine Learning Engineer to help them build and automate Chatbots for their SaaS product customer support.


Title: Machine Learning Engineer


Key Skills:

-2+ years of NLP experience (i.e. text classification, keyphrase extraction)

-5+ years of overall engineering experience

- Solid Java Spring Boot knowledge for REST API integration

-CI/CD configuration
